name: Bristow Group Inc.
description: Bristow Group Inc. is a leading provider of vertical flight services, specializing in helicopter transportation and related services to the energy and government sectors. Founded in 1955 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Bristow operates a fleet of helicopters and fixed-wing aircraft to deliver safe, reliable, and efficient air transportation services. The company primarily serves offshore oil and gas companies, providing critical support for exploration and production activities in remote locations. In addition to its core operations, Bristow is also engaged in search and rescue (SAR) missions, offering emergency medical services and support to government operations. With a strong commitment to safety and operational excellence, Bristow has earned a reputation as a trusted partner in the aviation industry. The company is actively working to advance its sustainability initiatives, including the integration of advanced technologies and alternative fuels to reduce its environmental footprint. Bristow's mission is to provide best-in-class aviation services while ensuring the highest levels of safety and customer satisfaction.
